resources.string: User does not exist or wrong password
This android project is created according to the needs of the Team 10 Project Design
A localized solution for motorized wheelchairs catered to patients with severe motor and dexterity problems with a biopotential control system that enables independent mobility of the patients.

Create = Create Brain Signal / Direction
Update = Update Brain Signal / Direction
Delete = Delete Brain Signal / Direction
Display = Display All Brain Signal / Direction
What is the name of your company?\nBioMotive is the name of the company, a portmanteau of biopotential and motive meaning motion through biopotential
What is the name of your project?\nBioPIn, it means Biopotential Integration

How the application works?\nThe application has 2 features, First it has a crud system where users can create, read, update and delete signal types that can help to improve the CNN model of the project design. Second it can fetch and display signal data so users can to monitor their signal data and adjust their wheelchair control based on the information provided
